articles.author: Jon Porter
articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S24 leak shows a familiar design ahead of early 2024 launch - The Verge
articles.description: Renders of the upcoming Samsung Galaxy S24 show a very similar looking device to this year’s Galaxy S23 including a squared off design, and no defined camera bump.
articles.content:
